quagga.input.subject: Notices Language
quagga.input.body:
---------------------- Forwarded by Elizabeth Sager/HOU/ECT on 12/30/99 08:46 
AM ---------------------------


"Yaish, Yair (OGC)" <YYaish@exchange.ml.com> on 12/28/99 05:22:00 PM
To: Elizabeth Sager/HOU/ECT@ECT
cc:  
Subject: Notices Language 



Elizabeth,

The following is the address where copies of notices should be sent to:

    Merrill Lynch & Co., Inc.
     Office of General Counsel - CICG
Legal
     World Financial Center, North Tower
     250 Vesey Street, 12th Floor
     New York, NY  10281-1312
     Phone: (212) 449-4367
     Fax: (212) 449-5559


Best regards,

Yair Yaish
Merrill Lynch (OGC)
212-449-2456
yyaish@exchange.ml.com
